attributes.action: We ask the Prime Minister to apologise to Hilary Mantel
attributes.additional_details:
The Prime Minister referred to comments about Kate Middleton made by British author Hilary Mantel as "completely misguided". Clearly the Prime Minister did not read or did not understand the speech in which Mantel made the comments.

Given his obvious misinterpretation of the speech and insulting words, we ask that the Prime Minister apologise to Hilary Mantel in a manner as public as that in which he condemned her.
